metadata.title: CVE-2024-23606 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the sopen_FAMOS_readfunctionality of The Biosig Project libbiosig 2.5.0 and Master Branch(ab0ee111). A specially crafted .famos file can lead to arbitrary codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: biosig package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
